caption.p: Percentage inhibition of α-glucosidase and α-amylase by CSEs 2–9 with acarbose as the reference standard. Inhibition values are expressed as means ± SD; n = 3. CSEs showing less than 5% enzyme inhibition are considered to have No Significant Activity (NSA). ** p ≤ 0.01, *** p ≤ 0.001, for significant change in α-glucosidase inhibition compared with Acarbose; + p ≤ 0.05, ++ p ≤ 0.01, ++++ p ≤ 0.0001 for significant change in α-amylase inhibition compared with Acarbose.
